Name: Duraludon
Description: Add a Ranged Attacker to your UNITE team with a powerhouse of a Pokémon that’s eager to shove out the opposition. Duraludon is ready to leverage light, efface earth, and wreak ruin in order to win.

Name: Mamoswine
Description: Mamoswine charges in with versatile ice attacks that can freeze opponents and leave them unable to move.

Name: Gardevoir
Description: Gardevoir strikes its opponents from far away with its mysterious psychic power. It has a lot of moves with unique movements, but they are very powerful when used effectively.

Name: Snorlax
Description: Snorlax can take a lot of hits. It’s a dependable Pokémon that can protect its allies from harm.

Name: Blissey
Description: Blissey is a Pokémon that excels at supporting its allies with moves that restore HP, cure status conditions, or empower allies!

Name: Zeraora
Description: Zeraora can close the distance between itself and its opponents as fast as lightning, dealing massive amounts of damage all at once.

Name: Sylveon
Description: Sylveon attacks opponents from a distance while increasing its stats and restoring its HP.

Name: Pikachu
Description: Pikachu is a Pokémon that excels at attacking opponents from far away with electricity. Sometimes the attacks even leave opposing Pokémon paralyzed!

Name: Charizard
Description: When it’s still a Charmander, it’s not the most reliable, but when it evolves into Charizard, it can use its powerful moves to attack and deal damage over a wide area.

Name: Blastoise
Description: Blastoise has a massive body to shield its allies with—and the power to blast away its opponents with water.

Name: Greedent
Description: Stash away or consume Berries strategically to overcome the opposition with this tricky Defender!

Name: Trevenant
Description: Add a Melee Defender to your UNITE team with a spectral Pokémon that’s ready to terrify the opposition. Trevenant is ready to unleash sinister fire, good old-fashioned slapping, and terrifying curses in order to win.

Name: Decidueye
Description: Astonish your foes from the shadows with a storm of quills, and nock ’em out!

Name: Tsareena
Description: Tsareena is ready to glide, kick, and stomp its way to victory.

Name: Dragonite
Description: Dragonite is ready to rampage through the competition in Pokémon UNITE as a Melee All-Rounder. Harnessing the power of fire, water, and electricity, Dragonite is a powerhouse that’s ready to stomp its way to victory.

Name: Aegislash
Description: Add a Melee All-Rounder to your team with a graceful Pokémon that effortlessly pivots between offense and defense. Aegislash is ready to help you battle like a chosen ruler with a regal moveset befitting the Royal Sword Pokémon.

Name: Cinderace
Description: Cinderace doesn’t just have high attack power—it’s also got the speed to drive opponents crazy.

Name: Gengar
Description: Gengar, a Pokémon that lurks in the shadows, is a master of surprise attacks.

Name: Cramorant
Description: Cramorant is the Gulp Pokémon. Cramorant’s Ability, Gulp Missile, allows it to attack by spitting out prey it catches with Dive.

Name: Wigglytuff
Description: Wigglytuff learns lots of moves that can stop opponents in their tracks, making it well-suited to using teamwork tactics with its allies in battle.

Name: Slowbro
Description: No matter the situation, Slowbro goes about life at its own pace. With its characteristic high defense and blissful unawareness, Slowbro is unfazed by opponents’ attacks.

Name: Alolan Ninetales
Description: Alolan Ninetales uses moves that freeze its opponents in ice, making them unable to move or attack.

Name: Machamp
Description: Machamp is a Pokémon that specializes in melee combat, powered by its strong fighting moves.

Name: Absol
Description: Absol is a Pokémon that can close the distance in an instant and deal massive amounts of damage.

Name: Garchomp
Description: Garchomp’s Ability, Rough Skin, means it can sometimes cause damage to Pokémon that hit it, so opponents that attack Garchomp carelessly may just get struck back. What’s more, using Dig lets Garchomp sneak-attack its opponents from underground.

Name: Lucario
Description: Lucario is a well-balanced Pokémon that combines speed and attack power.

Name: Mr. Mime
Description: Mr. Mime specializes in hindering opposing Pokémon with its tricky moves.

Name: Eldegoss
Description: Eldegoss is a master supporter that can restore its allies’ HP and boost their movement speed.

Name: Talonflame
Description: Talonflame toys with the opposing team by using its moves to quickly maneuver itself and fly over obstacles.

Name: Venusaur
Description: If its moves land successfully, Venusaur can deal a huge amount of damage to its opponents, even from far away.

Name: Greninja
Description: Greninja is a Pokémon that uses smokescreens and illusory copies of itself to hide.

Name: Crustle
Description: Crustle hinders its opponents using many different moves.

Name: Hoopa
Description: Astonish and confuse opponents in Pokémon UNITE with Hoopa, now available to join your team. This Pokémon is a strategically complex Ranged Supporter that, if played effectively, can help ally Pokémon heal and move efficiently around the battlefield—in addition to dealing damage with its delightfully ominous attacks.
